item.title: India’s Streaming Universe Hits 601 Million Users as Connected TV Surges 87%
item.description: India’s streaming audience has reached 601.2 million users, representing over 40% of the country’s population, according to new research from Ormax Media. The fifth edition of The Ormax OT
